faq.description: Get answers to the most common questions about our AI-powered garden design service

questions.question: How accurate are the generated garden designs?
questions.answer: Our IA garden designs are highly accurate, taking into account the specific dimensions of your space, lighting conditions, and climate zone. The IA has been trained with thousands of professional landscape designs and considers factors such as plant compatibility, seasonal changes, and maintenance requirements. Most users report 90%+ satisfaction with the design accuracy.

questions.question: Is it difficult to implement the generated designs?
questions.answer: Not at all! Each design comes with detailed implementation guidelines, plant lists with local suppliers, and step-by-step instructions. We provide shopping lists, planting schedules, and maintenance tips. Many designs can be implemented as weekend DIY projects, while others may require professional landscaping for complex features.

questions.question: How does the IA garden design compare to traditional landscape design?
questions.answer: The IA garden design offers several advantages: it's faster (2 minutes vs. weeks), more affordable (fraction of the cost), and provides multiple design options instantly. While traditional designers offer personalized consultations, our IA considers the same design principles, plant science, and aesthetics. Many professional landscapers actually use our tool for initial concepts.

questions.question: What types of photos work best for IA garden design?
questions.answer: For better results, upload clear, well-lit photos taken during daylight hours. Include the entire space you want to redesign, taken from a good vantage point. Multiple angles help, but a single photo is sufficient. The IA works with photos from any smartphone or camera - no special equipment is needed.

questions.question: What is included in the IA garden design service?
questions.answer: Each design includes: photorealistic visualizations, detailed plant lists with local availability, seasonal care guides, implementation schedules, cost estimates, and maintenance schedules. Premium plans also include multiple design variations, 3D renderings, and direct consultation with professional landscapers.

questions.question: Can I customize the generated designs?
questions.answer: Absolutely! IA designs serve as professional starting points that you can customize. You can specify preferences like color schemes, plant types, maintenance levels, and budget constraints. Our system learns from your feedback to create increasingly personalized designs that match your style and needs.
